programme.title: MST3K: The Unearthly
programme.desc: A mad scientist seeks immortality with trial-and-error gland experiments and his servant, Lobo.

programme.title: MST3K: Daddy-O
programme.desc: The crew riff on the short "Alphabet Antics" before watching Daddy-O (1958).

programme.title: MST3K: Mad Monster
programme.desc: Things get hairy on the Satellite of Love thanks to the lupine antics of The Mad Monster (1942).

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on the Best of Most Shocking ... Wild wheelmen! Gunning grannies! They all add up ... to FOUR WHEEL DEMOLITION! With never before seen smashes and crashes ... and new interviews with those who survived! A driver plows into a gas station ... and a clerk almost loses her head! Reckless teens behind the wheel of a stolen car make a pedal-pounding escape ... but meet a brutal end! A politician goes berserk ... and turns his pickup into a battering ram! This is not a movie. Everything you are about to see is REAL! Brace yourself! This is: The Best of Most Shocking – FOUR WHEEL DEMOLITION!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on the Best of Most Shocking! To motorcycle morons ... they all pay the price – for being YOUNG AND DUMB! With all-new moments of lawless stupidity ... and exclusive interviews from the geniuses behind the mayhem! Reckless teens in a stolen car lose control ... and plunge upside down into a lake! A parking lot prank ... goes up in smoke! A meth-head on a racing bike hits one-fifty ... but his crimes catch up with him! This is not a movie. Everything you are about to see is REAL! Brace yourself. This is ... The Best of Most Shocking – YOUNG AND DUMB!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! From speeding commuters ... to hard driving drunks ... don't get caught in the path of – DRIVERS OUT OF CONTROL. A trooper sets up a roadblock ... that nearly stops him dead. A preacher rides his motorcycle through church ... and winds up in hell. The camera rolls on a TV crew's drive ... and so does their car. Everything you're about to see is REAL! Brace yourself! This is: Most Shocking – DRIVERS OUT OF CONTROL!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! Whether they're caught on camera ... or caught by the law ... when these people strip down, they're – BUSTED IN THE BUFF! A naked man threatens cops with a bomb ... prompting an explosive response. A woman takes it off on the streets of New York ... and gets a free ride downtown. Two masked men flash patrons in a diner ... while a car thief jacks their getaway ride.This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL! Brace yourself! This is ... Most Shocking – BUSTED IN THE BUFF!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! From chaotic clashes ... to raging riots ... when tempers flare, it's – BEDLAM AND BRAWLS! A gang of thugs goes wild in a restaurant ... forcing patrons to feast on fists. The lead singer of the group Jamiroquai ... pops off against a crowd of paparazzi. Anarchists take to the streets ... turning the city into a war zone. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking – BEDLAM AND BRAWLS!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! From outrageous home movies ... to crime caught on tape ... it's a wild look through the lens of – CAMCORDER CHAOS! A wannabe storm chaser records a raging tornado ... and gets a close-up of terror. An on-camera hardhat ... shows how not to demolish a house. And later ... Drunken tailgaters light up the night ... forcing authorities to break up the party. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL! Brace Yourself! This is, Most Shocking – CAMCORDER CHAOS!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! From full throttle smashes ... to catastrophic collapses ... when forces collide, get ready for – HIGH OCTANE IMPACTS! An angry bull turns a cowering cowboy ... into a rodeo rocket. A drug crazed ex-con runs from the law ... and lets the bad times roll. A kiteboarder goes for big air ... and gets carried away. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking – HIGH OCTANE IMPACTS!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking ... From holiday havoc ... to fiesta fiascos ... when good times go bad, it's – PARTY PANDEMONIUM! Spectators line up for a circus parade ... and get caught in a procession of pain. A grade school Christmas pageant ... turns into a not-so-silent night. A street-side celebration starts with a flash ... and ends with a bang. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself. This is, Most Shocking – PARTY PANDEMONIUM!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking ... From terror on the track ... to chaos in the ring ... penalties abound with – COMPETITIONS GONE BAD! Spectators break up a wrestling match ... and get pinned by authorities. Soccer hooligans set fire to the stands ... then try to snuff out a cop. Bucking broncos turn an amateur rodeo ... into a brutal beating. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking – Competitions Gone Bad

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight on Most Shocking ... Whether they're seeing red ... or just monkeying around ... good luck taming ... WILD ENCOUNTERS! A dogcatcher investigates a pitbull attack ... and becomes the dog's next victim. An angry bull doesn't mince around ... and turns a thrill seeker into hamburger. A sharpshooter fires at a killer rogue lion ... and the hunter becomes the hunted. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking – WILD ENCOUNTERS!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight, on Most Shocking! From brutal burglars ... to onslaughts from nature ... there's no shortage of danger for ... CITIZENS UNDER ATTACK! A rap battle turns ugly ... when one beat maker gets dropped. An emcee gives a speech ... and gets hammered on his delivery. A gun-toting gangster unloads on his rival ... putting innocent bystanders in the crossfire. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking CITIZENS UNDER ATTACK!

programme.title: Most Shocking
programme.desc: Tonight ... on Most Shocking ... Whether they're on the run ... or on the attack ... it's a constant struggle to rein in – CRIMINALS OUT OF CONTROL! A desperate con seizes a window of escape ... and ends up in pain. A rooftop robber goes out on a limb ... and plummets toward disaster. An armed outlaw shoots at police ... and gets taken down in a hail of bullets. This is not a movie. Everything you're about to see is REAL. Brace yourself! This is, Most Shocking – CRIMINALS OUT OF CONTROL!
